character

Class Knight

  • java.lang.Object
    • character.Character
      • character.Knight
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Armor, Weapon

    public class Knight
extends Character
implements Weapon, Armor
    Knight.java is a child class that extends the parent class Character.java and implements the interfaces Weapon and Armor. The program creates a basic character through the Character class then promotes it into a knight by giving it a strength boost and giving it two weapons to triple it's attacks. In addition to giving it a much stronger armor.
    Since:
    2019 - 02 - 18
